name: Asteroid Attack (Eric Harper)
description:
Greetings Employee #1357-BA!

We've noticed that you've been falling behind on your asteroid quota. But don't worry. We're here to help! We've installed an auto-accelerator in your ship to help you mine more quickly and efficiently. You'll be paid by the hour but, the real money is in materials so try to mine as many asteroids as possible.

Good Luck,

          MineCo.

CONTROLS

Left and right arrows to move

Space to shoot

Music By DavidKBD

Ship Sprite By Rad Potato

SFX By GameSupplyGuy
